tasks.name: prepare_gdp_dataset
tasks.description: Clean and structure GDP data from various sources
tasks.prompt: Analyze the GDP data files in this project. Clean missing values, standardize country codes to ISO 3166-1 alpha-3, normalize date formats to YYYY-MM-DD, and create a unified dataset structure. Validate data types and ranges.

tasks.name: annotate_economic_indicators
tasks.description: Add metadata and annotations to economic indicators
tasks.prompt: Review economic indicators in the dataset. Add metadata including: data source, collection methodology, confidence level, seasonal adjustment status, and revision history. Create a data dictionary.

tasks.name: generate_synthetic_test_data
tasks.description: Create synthetic GDP data for testing
tasks.prompt: Generate synthetic GDP test data covering edge cases: missing values, outliers, different time series patterns, multiple countries including Cambodia (KHM), and various economic scenarios.

tasks.name: process_khmer_reports
tasks.description: Extract data from Khmer language economic reports
tasks.prompt: Process Khmer language economic reports. Extract key metrics, dates, and entities. Handle mixed Khmer-English text, numerical data in both Arabic and Khmer numerals, and maintain proper Unicode encoding.

tasks.name: translate_economic_terms
tasks.description: Build glossary of economic terms in Khmer
tasks.prompt: Create a comprehensive glossary mapping English economic terms to Khmer equivalents. Include: GDP (ផលិតផលក្នុងស្រុកសរុប), inflation (អតិផរណា), growth rate (អត្រាកំណើន), and domain-specific terminology.

tasks.name: validate_khmer_text
tasks.description: Validate Khmer text encoding and formatting
tasks.prompt: Check all Khmer text in the project for: proper UTF-8 encoding, correct character sequences, no mojibake, proper rendering of complex scripts, and bidirectional text issues.

tasks.name: evaluate_gdp_predictions
tasks.description: Assess accuracy of GDP prediction models
tasks.prompt: Evaluate GDP prediction models by: calculating RMSE, MAE, and MAPE; performing time series cross-validation; analyzing residuals; testing on different economic periods; generating performance reports.

tasks.name: test_edge_cases
tasks.description: Test model behavior on edge cases
tasks.prompt: Test models with edge cases: economic crises data, incomplete historical data, rapid growth periods, negative growth scenarios, and data from emerging markets including Cambodia.

tasks.name: benchmark_performance
tasks.prompt: Compare model performance against baselines: naive forecasts, ARIMA models, simple moving averages, and published economic forecasts. Generate comparative analysis reports.

tasks.name: finetune_economic_llm
tasks.prompt: Fine-tune an LLM for GDP analysis tasks. Prepare training data from economic reports, configure LoRA/QLoRA for efficient training, optimize for both English and Khmer text, and track training metrics.

tasks.name: optimize_inference
tasks.prompt: Optimize the economic analysis model for production: implement quantization, test inference speed, reduce memory footprint, set up caching strategies, and ensure sub-second response times.

prompts.data-curator-annotator: Prepare and validate all GDP datasets in the project. Check data quality, create summary statistics, and identify any data issues.
prompts.model-evaluation-qa: Evaluate all analysis scripts for correctness. Test calculation accuracy, validate economic formulas, and check for numerical stability.
